paragraphs.body: Charles has three brothers and received his first audition after a producer asked one of his brothers to audition for a role; Charles asked his mother if he could accompany his brother and was subsequently hired for his first acting role. He later appeared in a scene with his three brothers in The Three Stooges.
paragraphs.text: Charles has three brothers and received his first audition after a producer asked one of his brothers to audition for a role; Charles asked his mother if he could accompany his brother and was subsequently hired for his first acting role. He later appeared in a scene with his three brothers in The Three Stooges.

paragraphs.body: Charles' other film roles include November Christmas, Spooky Buddies, Least Among Saints, White Space, and a young Peter Parker in The Amazing Spider-Man. In 2014, Charles voiced Sherman in Mr. Peabody & Sherman.
paragraphs.text: Charles' other film roles include November Christmas, Spooky Buddies, Least Among Saints, White Space, and a young Peter Parker in The Amazing Spider-Man. In 2014, Charles voiced Sherman in Mr. Peabody & Sherman.

paragraphs.body: On television, Charles first appeared on the HBO series True Blood in 2010, and has also guest starred on Raising Hope, Community, Hot in Cleveland, the Disney Channel show Jessie, and the ABC comedy series The Neighbors.
